clip.quote: You're not going to wake up one day and feel like today is a great day to drop 500 grand.
clip.why_clipworthy: It's a relatable and humorous way to address buyer hesitation.
clip.suggested_hook: Ever feel anxious about making big financial decisions? You're not alone!

clip.quote: I think educating and coaching are the two main hubs of my business.
clip.why_clipworthy: Highlights the importance of client education in real estate.
clip.suggested_hook: Why educating your clients is the key to a successful real estate career.
